solution_line_template: The first two shipments of couscous added up to {first_shipment_weight} + {second_shipment_weight} = <<{first_shipment_weight}+{second_shipment_weight}={sum_first_two_shipments}>>{sum_first_two_shipments} pounds

Adding that weight to the next day's shipment results in a total weight of {sum_first_two_shipments} + {next_day_shipment_weight} = <<{sum_first_two_shipments}+{next_day_shipment_weight}={total_couscous_weight}>>{total_couscous_weight} pounds

Since each dish takes {couscous_per_dish} pounds, then the restaurant makes {total_couscous_weight}/{couscous_per_dish} = <<{total_couscous_weight}/{couscous_per_dish}={number_of_dishes}>>{number_of_dishes} dishes
